fw.name: CATPDMBase
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

class.name: CATPDMCATIAServices
class.abstract: Services to interface with CATIA client Modeler.

method.name: BindEnoviaIdToCATIA
method.abstract: Enable the client to go from a CATIPLMIdentificator to a CATIA modeler object already loaded in session.

method.name: ExtractEnoviaIdFromCATIA
method.abstract: Enable the client to go from a CATIA Modeler object and get its identificator.

class.name: CATPDMCSServices
class.abstract: Services to interface with VPMNav client Models.

method.name: RunObjectService
method.abstract: Enable the client execution of a server service.

method.name: CATAnalyseDocIdFromVPM
method.abstract: Returns the COID, COMPID, Table name and Environment name of a ENOVIAvpm V4 document.

method.name: CATAnalysePrintableIDFromVPM
method.abstract: Parses a ENOVIAvpm V4 printable Id.

method.name: CheckDocSave
method.abstract: Checks if a document in session and its pointed documents can be saved.

method.name: GetDocumentsToSave
method.abstract: Retrieves the pointed documents that need to be saved before the reference document.

method.name: GetPrintableId
method.abstract: Get a printable Id for a PDM instance or PDM document.

method.name: KeepQuiet
method.abstract: Controls weither meaningfull error are to be displayed or not in user report.

method.name: LoadNomadSession
method.abstract: Loads in CATIA session a whole Nomad Session.

method.name: LoadPDMDocument
method.abstract: Load in CATIA V5 session CATIA documents stored in a ENOVIA database.

method.name: NomadDocumentProperties
method.abstract: Returns information on documents of the Nomad session.

method.name: ReplaceDocument
method.abstract: Replaces in PDM a CATIA Document coming from a Nomad session.

method.name: ReplicateDocument
method.abstract: Exports a PDM Document in a filebase Nomad session.

function.name: DisconnectEV5Server
function.abstract: Stops the ENOVIA V5 server to which the client is connected.

function.name: ExtractDocsToFileDirectory
function.abstract:
Client side API to enable the extraction of a document whithout any pointed and Force RerouteLinks for pointed
Role: Enable the extraction of a document: From Vault to a file directory.

function.name: ExtractDocumentSetToFileDirectory
function.abstract: Extracts a document from ENOVIA V5 vault with its linked documents to a file directory.

function.name: GetDocumentSetFromV_IDAndRevision
function.abstract: Retrieves the document family for a given document revision from ENOVIA V5 database.

function.name: LoadFromPDM
function.abstract:
Interface to load in CATIA the product structure elements giving their uuidâ€™s specified through a list of CATIPLMIdentificator
Role: Load in CATIA (but does not open in editor) a list of product structure elements extracted from the ENOVIA database.

function.name: OpenCatalogDocumentFromV_ID
function.abstract: Loads a catalog document from ENOVIA V5 database in session.

function.name: OpenCatalogDocumentFromV_ID_AND_V_version
function.abstract: Loads a given version of a catalog document from ENOVIA V5 database in session.

function.name: OpenPartAndDocumentFromV_ID
function.abstract: Loads a part document from ENOVIA V5 database.

function.name: OpenPartAndDocumentFrom_V_ID_And_V_version
function.abstract: Loads a given version of a part document from ENOVIA V5 database.

function.name: RunServerCode
function.abstract: Enable the execution of command on ENOVIA V5 server.

function.name: SaveCatalogDocument
function.abstract: Saves a catalog document in ENOVIA V5 database.

function.name: SavePartAndDocument
function.abstract: Saves a part document and its associated reference document in ENOVIA V5 database.

function.name: SaveToPDM
function.abstract:
Interface to start EV5 Save process from CATIA based on a root starter doc loaded in CATIA Session
Role: Starts EV5 save process from a root doc available in CATIA session and Saves all related Docs to ENOVIA database.

function.name: SetEV5PersistencyMode
function.abstract: Interface to set the persistency mode for a product to be saved in ENOVIA V5 and its children.

function.name: StartEV5Server
function.abstract: Starts the ENOVIA V5 server and connects the user to the ENOVIA V5 database.
